title: Why you shouldn’t get back with your ex
text:

Old associations are hard to get over, so it’s quite natural that you should want to get in touch with a former boyfriend when you are feeling low or just frisky. However, the disadvantages of raking up a failed relationship are far more that the short term gains that you are likely to get. Here are all the reasons why it’s important to stop yourself from dialling that number.Keeping in touch with your ex-boyfriend can make your current partner hurt, very insecure and also doubt your commitment to the relationship. And it’s even worse if you keep running to him when you are facing issues with the guy you are with now. You’d do better to have a face-to-face with your current guy and fix your relationship issues.Your relationship ended for a reason and you need to get closure to move on with your life. However, if you keep reaching out to your ex at the slightest moment of vulnerability, you will never be able to give yourself the emotional distance that is needed to disentangle yourself from the bond.If your ex-boyfriend is less than nice, then going back to him, and exposing your weakness for him, leaves you at a risk of exploitation both emotional and physical. Why do you want to be used and discarded once again?If you are still single after your breakup, the temptation to seek the comfort of an old flame may be stronger. However, this is all the more reason why you shouldn’t. Talking to your ex is just a way of prolonging your association with him. Remember it will be hard for you to fnd someone new till you are truly single!
description: Tempted to make that booty call to your ex? We tell you all the reasons why you should stop yourself from dialling his number.
